title: VMware vRealize Log Insight setConfig Missing Authentication for Critical Function Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of VMware vRealize Log Insight. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the setConfig function. The issue results from the lack of authentication prior to allowing access to functionality. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of root.
addtionnal_details: VMware has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.vmware.com/security/advisories/VMSA-2023-0001.html
timeline:
2022-09-02 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2023-02-09 - Coordinated public release of advisory
